content: the beloved eyelet edged dishcloth praised for its simple beauty has been resized for your wine glass subtle stitch changes have been made to accommodate for the lack of elasticity when knitting with linen the texture of nubbly garter stitch combined with the elegance of linen yarn is divine i loved knitting these and hope you will too one skien of flax & twine 100% linen yarn will make 6 or 7 coasters for a free dishcloth pattern using the same concept see this pattern https //www ravelry com/projects/kristenlynnea/garter-stitch-diagonal-dishcloth
